name: drupal-gulp
description: /*------------------------------------*\   #Start Project New \*------------------------------------*/ Step 1: COPY folder assets, gulpfile.js, package.json, .gitignore, index.html (if used) Step 2: connect server  	- Go to path server to project (existed package.json) 	- typing:  *npm I* 	- wait to completed. Step 3:  	- Test build: gulp default 	- Styling : gulp watch
